resources.string: 2020 Olympic Games will take place in Seattle.
First modern Olympic games were held in 1796.
In the 2020 Olympics, there will 48 sports disciplines.
The Olympic flag consists of 5 colors.
Women were allowed to participate in the Olympic games for the first time in 1900.
Gold medals are made of 50% gold.
Michael Phelps is the most decorated Olympic athlete.
Men and women do not compete against each other in any sport.
Swimming with obstacles was an Olympic discipline in one Game
